title: (x) Rose Bowl Game wide flare serif - Copperplate Gothic {Stephen Lording}
content:
Can someone identify the Rose Bowl Game font?  
 [http://www.tournamentofroses.com/images/homepage/2007rbg.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202144022/http:/www.tournamentofroses.com/images/homepage/2007rbg.gif "http://www.tournamentofroses.com/images/homepage/2007rbg.gif")

 [‹ (x) "Videospiele" slab serif - FF Zine Slab Display {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202144022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30054 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Furia "Pieces Of Paradise" album title - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alternates {Lari} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202144022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30051 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zzi

comments.content: Thank you. I don’t have Gothic on this machine but I have Copperplate.

I believe that Copperplate without the Gothic is the version that’s bundled with OSX. I’m unsure of the exact differences, but I notice the Light version on my system looks like a pseudo-caps, where the cap letters are heavier than the rest. Ugly.

As an aside: Copperplate’s the typeface people [love to hate](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202144022/http:/typophile.com/node/20502). :-)
